title: AgentLock
description: Mutex protocol for concurrent agent coordination in Auraxis Platform. Written to .context/agent_lock.json when an agent session starts. Cleared on session end. Prevents two agents from working on the same repo simultaneously.

agent.description: Identifier of the agent holding the lock

repo.description: Repo scope of the lock. Use 'platform' for platform-level work.

since.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the lock was acquired

expires_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the lock expires (default TTL: 4h)

task.description: Brief description of the current task (for display/debugging)

pid.description: Process ID or session identifier (use 'interactive' for REPL sessions)
